title: Integer to BCD Conversion
description: INT_TO_BCDC converts the input value IN to a BCD coded output value.
name: INT_TO_BCDC

input.name: IN
input.description: The integer value to be converted into BCD format.

output.name: BYTE
output.description: The BCD representation of the input integer.

return_value.description: The result of the BCD conversion as a byte.
